catalog_info.title: Introduction to Social Studies
catalog_info.notes: Tu., 2-4, and a weekly section Th., 2-4 Richard Tuck, and members of the Committee
catalog_info.prereq: Prerequisite: Social Studies 10a AND Social Studies Concentrators
catalog_info.description: This class continues the introduction to the classic texts of social theory begun in Social Studies 10a through the twentieth century. Authors include Friedrich Nietzsche, Max Weber, Emile Durkheim, Sigmund Freud, and Michel Foucault.
